items.sentence: How much time did you spend doing research before you started writing?
Tom\'s criminal record consists of only two drunken driving citations.
Tom\'s grades have been slipping, so he really needs to hit the books.
We don\'t want to do anything without thinking about the consequences.
Tom told me he checked out a book about Boston from the local library.
Tom wanted to impress his friends, but he just made a fool of himself.
Tom, Mary, John and a few other people plan to do that this afternoon.
Monday is the only day of the week that I don\'t get home before 2:30.
She claims that she knows nothing about him, but I don\'t believe her.
That guy over there is either Tom or someone who looks a lot like him.
